mapper.select: select R.*, C.CATEGORY_THEME from request R INNER join category C on R.request_category_no = C.category_no ORDER BY REQUEST_NO desc
select R.*, C.CATEGORY_THEME from request R INNER join category C on R.request_category_no = C.category_no where R.request_no = #{requestNo}
select RR.*, M.member_nick from request_reply RR INNER join member M on RR.request_reply_member_no = M.member_no WHERE RR.request_reply_no = #{requestReplyNo} ORDER BY RR.request_reply_pk_no DESC
select count(*) from request_reply RR INNER join member M on RR.request_reply_member_no = M.member_no WHERE RR.request_reply_no = #{requestReplyNo} ORDER BY RR.request_reply_pk_no DESC
mapper.update: update request set request_like_count = request_like_count + 1 where request_no = #{requestNo}

update request set request_reply_count = request_reply_count - 1 where request_no = #{requestNo}
